sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.AJAXSysListSaveWorker</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>true</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>AJAXSysListSaveWorker</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var AJAXSysListSaveWorker = Class.create();
AJAXSysListSaveWorker.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
	start: function() {
		// Setup background worker
		var worker = new GlideSysListSaverWorker();
		worker.setListID(this.getParameter('sysparm_ajax_processor_list_id'));
		worker.setViewName(this.getParameter("sysparm_ajax_processor_view_name"));
		worker.setFieldsSelected(this.getParameter("sysparm_ajax_processor_fields_selected"));
		worker.setProgressName("Saving Form List");
			
		// Start worker in the background
		worker.setBackground(true);
		worker.start();
		
		// Return worker progress ID to caller
		var progressId = worker.getProgressID();
		return progressId;
    },

    type: 'AJAXSysListSaveWorker'
});]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2014-11-21 19:52:03</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>5cfc3811c3203100b9e7ff9c02d3aeb3</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>AJAXSysListSaveWorker</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="System (glidesoft)" source="glidesoft">079c7c036d2220100acb70b3534330b0</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_5cfc3811c3203100b9e7ff9c02d3aeb3</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2014-11-21 19:52:03</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>746</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
